Participants.evidence: This study was performed in 13 patients who were candidates for facelift.

Intervention.evidence: Submitted to one of three protocols: injection of SVF-enriched fat or expanded adipose-derived stem cells or fat plus PRP in the preauricular areas.

Objective.evidence: Objectives: To determine if PRP injection could replace the cutaneous regenerative effect of adipose-derived stem cells.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Fragments of skin were removed before and 3 months after treatment and analyzed by optical and electron microscopy.

Result_Outcome.evidence: The use of fat plus PRP led to the presence of more pronounced inflammatory infiltrates and a greater vascular reactivity.
